sentences.en: ‘Would you like some milk?’ ‘Just a tad.’
And when it comes to eggs, they are a perfect packaging material - though a tad too brittle.
sentences.cn: 对于蛋而言, 这件外衣实在是太棒了,就是有点易碎.

sentences.en: But this stuff strikes me as being a tad too clever.
sentences.cn: 但这样的策略让我感到有点儿太聪明了.

sentences.en: Could you turn the sound down just a tad?
sentences.cn: 你把音量调低一点儿好吗？

sentences.en: Here you can take an elephant ride through teak forests and farmland to Tad Sae Waterfall.
sentences.cn: 在这里,您可以通过柚木森林和农田的泰德世瀑布一骑象.

sentences.en: I need a tad of salt please.
Kate slowed done a tad , to a, but more reasonable pace.
sentences.cn: 卡蒂稍微放慢了速度, 但这样的速度更加谨慎.

sentences.en: Last week, doctors in Massachusetts announced that senator Tad Kennedy has brain cancer.
sentences.cn: 上星期, 马萨诸塞州的医生们宣布K参议员患有脑癌.

sentences.en: Q Will there be new winning conditions in TAD, like Regicide?
sentences.cn: TAD会有新的胜利条件, 例如弑君 吗 ?

sentences.en: The day off was a tad too late for some players.
sentences.cn: 也许大家都太累了,所以休息显得来的晚了一些.

sentences.en: The fallout a tad worse than Gulf War Syndrome.
sentences.cn: 引起的疾病比波斯湾战争的后遗症还严重.

sentences.en: The prices were a tad above average, but they're of the highest quality.
sentences.cn: 价格比平均水平略高，可它们的质量是最好的。

sentences.en: Try to keep your cool; you may be a tad frazzled by all the rushing around.
sentences.cn: 遇事一定要冷静, 不要被周围繁杂的事务冲昏了头.

sentences.en: Will there be new winning conditions in TAD, like Regicide?
sentences.cn: tad会有新的胜利条件, 例如弑君 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can decrease the intensity, but the surfaces will always be lighted a tad bit.
sentences.cn: 你可以降低灯光强度, 但物体表面仍然会偏亮.

trans.tran_cn: 小孩子（尤指男孩），微量，少量，一点点
